name: Sweet Energy Efficiency
author: wpdirectorykit.com

sections.description:
This WordPress Plugin will Graphically Visually present Energy Efficiency
Class / Label / Rating / Scale with related consumption values, ideally to use on real estate
websites/portals but also for any other purpose where Energy Efficient is very important like Cars,
Ait Conditioning devices, Fridges etc.

Best to use with themes and plugins made by our team: wpdirectorykit.com

Extra customizable, select any colors, units, values so suitable for any standard or even for different purpose.

Features:

  • Shortcodes
  • Widgets
  • Elementor elements
  • Customizable colors, values, numbers
  • Support multiple templates/graphics designs
sections.installation:
1. Upload sweet-energy-efficiency.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can this work with any theme

Yes Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin is compatible with any theme

Does Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin support Elementor

Yes Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin works great in Elementor

How Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin affect to performances

You will not notice any performance troubles, Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin using custom tables and basic queries to optimize performance

Where to submit idea, suggestion or question related to Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin

Inside Sweet Energy Efficient Graph plugin is contact form or you can ask on support@swit.hr
